Japanese Text: （この生徒会長……噂に違わぬ性格の悪さね）
Translation: (The president of the student council... has a personality just as bad it's as rumored to be.)

Japanese Text:
沙都子が絡む話を、私が無視できないと
わかった上で、彼女の名前を出すとは……。
Translation: To think she brought up Satoko's name because she knows I can't just leave with her on topic...

Japanese Text:
（こんな人の片腕になんて、まっぴら御免ね。
猫の手程度であっても、引っかいてやりたいわ）
Translation:
(I flat out wish to avoid becoming this person's right hand.
It doesn't matter if she turns me into a cat's paw either; I'd still want to claw right at her.)

Japanese Text:
とはいえ、感情的になればこの人の#p思惑#sおもわく#rに
踊らされるだけだ。
落ち着け、クールになれ古手梨花……！
Translation: If I get led astray by my emotions here, then everything will go exactly according to this person's plan. Calm down and stay cool, Rika Furude...!

Japanese Text:
沙都……北条さんは、今日は風邪で休んでいると
彼女のルームメイトから聞きました。
Translation: Sato-... Houjou-san's roommate told me that she would be skipping school today since she caught a cold.

Japanese Text:
だから、昼食の後は部屋で寝ている沙都子に
会いに行こうと思い、その前に購買室で差し入れを
買うため財布を取りに自室へと戻ったのだ。
Translation: That's why I was planning on paying a visit to Satoko after lunch while she was asleep in her room. Before that, I thought of buying some snacks for Satoko at the store, so I went back to my dorm to get my wallet.

Japanese Text:
態度が変わりましたね。
やっぱり北条沙都子さんのこと、気になりますか？
Translation:
Your attitude has changed completely.
So you are curious about Satoko Houjou-san, aren't you?

Japanese Text: ですから、北条さんがどうしたんですか？！
Translation: But just what is it that you have to say about Houjou-san already?!

Japanese Text:
苛立って要点を聞き出そうと詰め寄るが、
生徒会長は飄々とした態度のままだ。
Translation: I felt frustrated, so I pressured her to get to the point, but the president simply maintained her laid-back attitude.

Japanese Text:
本当に、この人は誰かの気分を
逆なでするのが上手だ。
……決して見習いたくはないけれど。
Translation:
This person does spectacularly at rubbing people the wrong way. 
...Not that it's an ability I'd be fond of learning, though.

Japanese Text:
まぁまぁ、落ち着いて。
強いて言うなら……問題発生、ですかね？
Translation:
Dear me, calm down. 
To put it bluntly... I'm assuming there's been some trouble?

Japanese Text: も、問題……っ？
Translation: T-Trouble...?

Japanese Text:
ふむ。そう尋ねるということは、古手さん。
あなたには全く心当たりがないということですか？
Translation: Mhm. Since you're questioning it, Furude-san, does that mean you've had no clue about it?

Japanese Text: 問い返されて、奥歯を噛みしめる。
Translation: With that retort, I clenched my teeth.

Japanese Text: （心当たりがあるから、でしょう……っ！）
Translation: (Ever think I said that because I {i}do{/i} have a clue...?!)

Japanese Text:
でも、それは沙都子だけのせいじゃない。
あの子が苦しんでいる時に、私はうまく
励ましてあげられなかったことがあった……。
Translation: But it's not just Satoko's fault. There was a time I was unable to cheer her up when she was suffering the most...

Japanese Text:
ひとつ間違えていたら、私たちの間には
亀裂が生じて、取り返しのつかない事態に
陥っていたことだって起こりえただろう。
Translation: One misstep could have created a rift between us, causing us to fall into an irrevocable situation.

Japanese Text:
……それは、今想像しても恐ろしい
最悪の「未来」だった。
Translation: ...That's the most terrifying "future" I could ever imagine to have once existed.

Japanese Text:
た、確かに……以前は少し、あの子も態度が
よくないところがあったかもしれません……。
Translation: Th-there... definitely may have been a time when her behavior wasn't the best...

Japanese Text:
規律を重んじる聖ルチーア学園の校風は、
自由奔放が持ち味でもある沙都子にとって
あまり相性がいいものではなかった。
Translation: As a free spirit, Satoko was a bad match with St. Lucia's disciplinary values.

Japanese Text:
ここへ通っていたことのある詩音に
学園のことを聞いた時、もう少し深く突っ込んで
確かめておくべきだったと何度後悔したことか。
Translation: Countless times have I reflected upon not having gone more into depth about this place with Shion, knowing she had experience with this place.

Japanese Text:
……それでも、沙都子は頑張った。
今までとは違う世界での生活や価値観に、
なんとか馴染もうと努力してくれた。
Translation: ...And yet, Satoko did her best for me. Even up until now, she's been making great effort in becoming intimate with a world different from her own, adapting her lifestyle and values.

Japanese Text:
イタズラ好きで好奇心旺盛な彼女にとって
個性を押し込むことがどれだけ大変だったか、
そばにいた私が痛いほどに理解している。
Translation: As someone who has always been by her side, I understand how dangerous it was to cram a prank-loving, curiosity-filled personality like hers into a place like this. I understand it so well that it hurts.

Japanese Text:
それくらいに、頑張っていた彼女が
問題行動……？　何かの間違いとしか
思えないし、信じられない。
Translation: She had been putting in all that effort, and now she has problematic behavior...? I can't imagine or believe that that's anything more than a misconception.

Japanese Text:
あの子はあの子なりに、学園生活になじもうと
必死に努力していました。先生たちからの評価も、
少しずつですがよくなってきています……。
Translation: She's been putting in her all getting used to academy life, even if it's in her own way. Her reputation with teachers has slowly been improving too...

Japanese Text:
そうですね。……もっとも教師陣は
素行の改善なんて実はどうでもよくて、
成績のことしか関心がないようですが。
Translation: That's true. ...Although it's not like the teachers genuinely care for a change of behavior; they're only interested in your grades.

Japanese Text:
実際私なんて、普段の振る舞いは最悪でも
成績だけちゃんとキープしているおかげで、
模範生徒扱いですからね。
Translation: In fact, my behavior is the worst, but since I properly keep up with my grades, I get role-model student treatment.

Japanese Text:
今はあんたのことなんてどうでもいいんだ、と
せり上がってきた悪態を辛うじて飲み込む。
そして、
Translation: "I couldn't care less about you right now", I had to supress my emotions and stop myself before that insult left my mouth. Instead, I said...

Japanese Text:
では、成績ですか？
そっちだって、彼女なりに努力して
平均点もあがってきています！！
Translation: So this is about grades? She's been doing her very best in that regard, and she's even raising her average score!!

Japanese Text: えぇ、それは知っています。
Translation: Yes, I know that.

Japanese Text:
合格基準ギリギリだったとはいえ、
補習組行きになることもなくなった。
とても頑張っていたと思います。
Translation: Her grades are dangerously close to the average passing level, so she doesn't have to go to remedial classes anymore. I believe she's truly been doing her best.

Japanese Text: だったら、いったい何の問題が――？
Translation: Then, what kind of trouble are you--?

Japanese Text:
落ち着いてください、古手さん。
ほら、これでも飲んでください。
Translation: Please stay calm, Furude-san. Here, have a drink.

Japanese Text:
生徒会長が差し出してきたのは、
缶コーヒーだった。
Translation: The president offered me a can of coffee.

Japanese Text:
正直言って一瞬、払い落としてやりたい思いも
浮かんできたけれど……迂闊に敵対行動をとれば、
沙都子の命運を左右しかねない。
Translation: To be frank, I felt like smacking it out of her hand for a second... but if I was to be hostile towards her senselessly, I wouldn't be able to steer Satoko's fate in the right direction.

Japanese Text: 私は少し迷ってから……無言でそれを受け取った。
Translation: I am a bit lost... so I silently took her words.

Japanese Text:
両手で包み込むと、少しぬるくなった缶が、
じんわりと手のひらを温めてゆく。
Translation: The slightly cooled can in my right hand gradually warms up my palm.

Japanese Text:
（あれ、でもどうしてここに、缶コーヒーが？
こんな飲み物は、学園内で見かけなかったような……）
Translation: (Huh, but how is there canned coffee here? I could have sworn I've never seen any on campus grounds...)

Japanese Text:
先ほども申し上げたように、
最近の北条沙都子さんは傍目から見ても
良い方向に改善されつつあると思います。
Translation: Just as I had stated earlier, you would think Satoko Houjou-san appears to be improving, glancing in from an outside perspective.

Japanese Text:
ですが……せっかく成績という課題を
クリアしたというのにあれはまずい、よくない。
実によくないと思います。
Translation: However... even though she accomplished the feat of getting good grades through effort, what she did is bad, not good. It truly isn't good at all, in my opinion.

Japanese Text:
私としても大変遺憾で、非常に残念ですが……
このままでは補習組どころか、学園にさえ
いられなくなってしまうかもしれません。
Translation: It is with immense regret and extreme shame for me to say this... but even with those remedial classes, she might not be able to stay in the academy.

Japanese Text:
回りくどい言い方をしないで！
沙都子が、何をしたっていうのっ？
Translation: Stop being so roundabout! What are you saying Satoko did?

Japanese Text: いなくなりました。
Translation: She disappeared.

Japanese Text:
意味がわからなかった。……いや、わかる。
でも、そんなことはあり得ないと
脳が思考を止め、理解することを拒否していた。
Translation: I didn't understand the meaning behind that. ...No, I did understand. But I thought such a thing was impossible, so my brain stopped working and refused to grasp it.

Japanese Text:
「今」の沙都子がそんなことをするなんて、
絶対にあり得ない……ッ！
Translation: There's no way the "current" Satoko would do that...!

Japanese Text:
では、余計な修飾はかえって無粋なので
単刀直入に申し上げます。
Translation: I'll refrain from beating around the bush and tell you directly.

Japanese Text:
脱走したのです。
北条さんは、この学園から……。
Translation: Houjou-san escaped from the academy...

Japanese Text:
生徒会長は片手に缶コーヒーを
持ったまま、あっさりと最悪の想像を肯定した。
Translation: With that can of coffee in her right hand, she affirmed me of the worst case scenario.

Japanese Text:
おそらくですが、体調が悪いと言って
ひとり部屋に籠もったスキに逃げ出したのでしょう。
Translation: I presume she lied about being sick, and as soon as she was alone in her room, she ran away.

Japanese Text: だっ……脱走って、あの脱走ですか？！
Translation: B-By escape... you mean that kind of escape?!

Japanese Text:
あの、がどれを指すのかわかりませんが、
つまりは学園から姿を消したということです。
Translation: Um, I'm not sure of any other kind of escape, but it means she completely disappeared from the academy.

Japanese Text: そん、な……。
Translation: It can't... be...

Japanese Text:
衝撃で手から力が抜け、
缶コーヒーが地面へ滑り落ちる。
Translation: My grip loosens from the shock, and the can of coffee slides to the ground.

Japanese Text:
栓を開けないままのそれは地面を転がる。
その小さな音が、今はどこか遠くにあるような気がした。
Translation:
The unopened bottle rolls on the ground.
The small noise it made felt very distant to where I was now.

Japanese Text:
何かの間違いでしょう？！
沙都子とは、昨日も普通に話をしていたわ！
Translation: This has to be a misunderstanding, right?! We were talking like we always have up until yesterday!

Japanese Text:
雑誌を読みながら、流行りの洋服の話をしたり！
冬休みに入ったら、見たい映画の話をしたり……！
Translation: We talked about fashionable clothes while reading magazines! We talked about movies we want to watch once we get on break...!

Japanese Text:
それなのに、突然「脱走」なんて……
ありえるわけないじゃないッ！
Translation: And yet, for her to "escape" so suddenly... there's no way that's possible!

Japanese Text:
そうは言っても、事実は事実です。
いくら否定しても、何も変わりませんよ。
Translation: Even if you say that, this is reality. Deny it all you want, but nothing will change.

Japanese Text:
淡々とした宣告に、動揺を隠せない。
私も心のどこかで「可能性」を感じて
しまっているからだろうか……？
Translation: I couldn't hide my inner turmoil from the detached nature of that sentence. Is it because I felt deep in my heart that this could be "possible"...?

Japanese Text: （っ……違う、違う違う！）
Translation: (......You're wrong, you're wrong, that's wrong!)

Japanese Text:
湧いた疑念を、頭を振って必死に追い出す。
そして私は、思いつくまま反論を唱えていった。
Translation:
I desperately shake my head to drive away my rising suspicion.
So, I thought of ways to argue back instead.

Japanese Text:
そ……そもそも、どうして生徒会長はあの子が
脱走したって決めつけるんですかっ？
Translation: How... how can you be so sure that girl ran away in the first place?

Japanese Text:
姿が見えないっていうだけなら、
何かトラブルでもあって、私や他の人たちの前に
出られなくなっているのかもしれないのに……！
Translation: She could be somewhere we're unable to see due to some sort of issue coming up...!

Japanese Text:
彼女がこっそり抜け出すのを見た、
という目撃証言があるのです。
Translation: There is an eyewitness that stated she was seen escaping.

Japanese Text:
ッ……？
見間違いという可能性はありますよね？！
Translation:
...?
Then there's a possibility that person misunderstood, isn't there?!

Japanese Text:
学園に出入りしている業者の人が、
駅でわが校の生徒を見かけた……という話も
耳に入っています。
Translation: One of the suppliers coming onto the campus said that they caught sight someone from the academy at the station... or so I happened to hear.

Japanese Text: それがなんで沙都子だと……？！
Translation: And why do you assume that's Satoko...?!

Japanese Text:
外見的特徴と、目撃時間が一致しています。
……逆に聞きますが、事実でないのであれば
反証となるものを見せてください。
Translation: Her appearance, characteristics, and the time she was seen all match. ...But if you have any information that would prove this wrong, please do provide that for me.

Japanese Text:
ちなみに北条さんの部屋は、現在無人です。
同室の子は補習組なので、戻ってくるのに
もうしばらくかかるそうですが……。
Translation: By the way, Houjou-san's room is vacant currently. Her roommate is in remedial classes, so it'll be a while until she returns...

Japanese Text:
彼女の姿を見た者は、今のところ
皆無と断定しても差し支えはないでしょう。
Translation: It is not far-fetched to conclude that no one has seen her at all.

Japanese Text:
……以前の沙都子ならば、学園を去ったと
聞かされたとしても……落ち込みはするものの、
私はそこまで驚かなかったと思う。
Translation: ...If this was the Satoko from the past, and someone told me she escaped the academy... I would be depressed, but I wouldn't be this surprised.

Japanese Text:
でも、あの子は変わった。
相変わらず、自ら進んで他の生徒との関わりを
持つことこそなかったけれど……。
Translation: But that girl has changed. She's still refraining from engaging with the other students as usual, but...

Japanese Text:
それでも以前のような、疲れ切って
虚ろな目をすることはあまり見なくなった。
Translation: Recently, I don't see her looking exhausted or having that empty look in her eyes as much as she did before.

Japanese Text:
それに、未来のこと……
ルチーアを卒業した後の展望についてさえ、
２人の話題に上がることがあった。
Translation: And as for the future... we started talking about our plans once we graduate from Lucia.

Japanese Text:
嬉しかった。幸せだった。
そして、あの子が前を向いてくれる限り私は
どこまでも、なんでも頑張ることができる……。
Translation:
I was happy. It was a blissful time.
As long as she's looking ahead, I feel like I can do anything, like I can do my very best...

Japanese Text:
なのに……そんな沙都子が急に、それも私に
何の相談もなく脱走するなんて――。
Translation: And yet... for Satoko to suddenly escape, and without telling me anything about it----

Japanese Text:
とにかく、生徒会長の証言だけでは信用できない。
私は沙都子の不在を確かめるため、
寮の中へと駆けだそうとして――。
Translation: Anyway, I can't trust the president's eyewitness account alone. As I was about to run towards the dormitory to confirm Satoko's absence----

Japanese Text: ……話は最後まで聞いてください、古手さん。
Translation: ...Please listen to everything I have to say, Furude-san.

Japanese Text:
凛、と涼やかに響くその制止の声に、
思わず息をのんで足を止めた。
Translation: Her icy yet clear and commanding voice made me draw breath and stop in my tracks unconsciously.

Japanese Text:
私の言を疑うのは自由ですが……
その真偽を確かめに行くのは時間の無駄です。
……ことは急を要します。どうか、ご理解を。
Translation:
Feel free to doubt what I say but... going to check is a waste of time.
...This is an urgent matter. I ask for your understanding.

Japanese Text:
確かめもしないで言うことではありませんが、
仮にもし、今聞いた話が事実だとしたら……！
Translation: I can't say for certain without checking, but if what I heard just now really is true, then...!

Japanese Text:
ご安心を。今のところ、
彼女が失踪した「かもしれない」情報は
私の手元で止めています。
Translation: At ease. I'm the only one who has caught wind of this fact, so this information of her is "subjective" for now.
Huh...?

Japanese Text:
この事実を、先生方や大半の生徒は知りません。
つまり、現状で知っているのは
非常に狭い範囲に限られています。
Translation: Most of the faculty and student body are unaware of this fact. More specifically, the scope of people that do know about this situation is extremely limited.

Japanese Text:
……ただし、このまま夜になれば
そうもいかなくなるでしょう。
Translation: ...Nonetheless, that may no longer be so by nighttime.

Japanese Text:
ことが明るみに出た場合、
最低でも北条沙都子さんの補習組行きは確実。
Translation: If this does come to light, at the very least, it's certain that Satoko Houjou-san will get sent to remedial classes again.

Japanese Text:
最悪の場合は、懲罰部屋に監禁……いえ、
強制的に自主退学もありえるかもしれません。
Translation: But in the worst case, she might be confined in a discipline chamber... no, it's possible she may even be forced into a voluntary withdrawal.

Japanese Text:
もっとも、彼女がそれを望んでいるということも
考えられますので、その場合は引き留めるのは
困難だと思いますが……。
Translation: Nonetheless, it can also be considered that this is what she wishes, so in that situation, it may be difficult to stop her...

Japanese Text:
そんなはずないわ！
あんたは知らないでしょう、沙都子はあんなに……！
Translation: There's no way that's true! You don't know anything about how much Satoko has...!

Japanese Text:
あんなに、勉強を頑張っていたのに……
結果もちゃんと、出てきているのに……！
Translation:
How much she's done her best at studying... 
And how she's been getting better grades...!

Japanese Text:
それを全部無しにするなんて……ありえない！
絶対に認めないし、認めてたまるものかっ！
Translation:
To render all of that as null... it's inconceivable! 
I will absolutely not accept that! As if I would ever!

Japanese Text: というわけで……早急に手を打つ必要があります。
Translation: And for this reason... we must quickly take measures.

Japanese Text: 手を、打つ……？
Translation: Take... measures...?

Japanese Text:
単純な話です。ことが明るみに出る前に、
北条さんが寮に戻っていればそれでいい。
Translation: It's simple. Before this comes to light, all Houjou-san would need to do is return to her dorm.

Japanese Text: それって……。
Translation: That's...

Japanese Text:
夜の点呼までに北条さんを探し出して、
寮に連れ戻し……脱走があった事実自体を
なかったことにするんです。
Translation: Until the nightly rollcall, we can search for Houjou-san and bring her back to her dorm... and that would make it as if the escape itself never happened.

Japanese Text: だけど、そんなこと……。
Translation: But that would be...

Japanese Text:
学内の目撃者には口止めを施しています。
出入り業者の方にも、彼女はちゃんとした
外出届を出していると口添えしておきました。
Translation: The eyewitnesses on the school grounds are keeping their mouths shut for the time being. I've also told the supplier that she properly put in a report that she will be out for the day.

Japanese Text:
点呼までに彼女を連れ戻しさえすれば、
全部を無かったことにできる……私ならば。
Translation: If she is brought back before rollcall, we can make it so nothing went wrong... as long as I get involved.

Japanese Text:
そう言いながら、生徒会長は懐から何かを
取り出し、こちらへ無造作に差し出してきた。
Translation: As the president said that, she pulled something out from her chest pocket and casually held it out to me.

Japanese Text: これは……。
Translation: These are...

Japanese Text: 東京行きの新幹線の回数券と、地図です。
Translation: A ticket for the bullet train to Tokyo, along with a map.

Japanese Text:
目撃した業者の話によれば、
彼女は東京行きの新幹線に乗った可能性が高い。
Translation: Going by the supplier's account, there is a very high possibility of her getting on a bullet train to Tokyo.

Japanese Text: 新幹線を使えば、東京駅まではすぐですから。
Translation: If you take that bullet train, you'll make it to Tokyo Station in no time.

Japanese Text: 東京……？
Translation: Tokyo...?

Japanese Text:
あと、地図にも書いてありますが裏庭の奥に
私だけが知っている秘密の抜け道があります。
Translation: Also, in the back of the rear garden, there is a secret path that only I know of drawn onto this map.

Japanese Text:
地図通りのルートを使えば、
路線バスが通る大通りにショートカットできます。
Translation: By following this route on the map, you can take a shortcut to the main road where the transit buses are.

Japanese Text:
多少道は荒れていますが……
ま、古手さんなら大丈夫でしょう。
Translation: This path is a bit rough... but, well, if it's you, Furude-san, I'm sure you'll be okay.

Japanese Text: ……。あなたは何が目的で、こんなことまで……？
Translation: ...Why go this far...?

Japanese Text:
そんなことより、今は北条さんを
連れ戻すことが最優先だと思います。
Translation: Reasoning aside, I believe the priority right now is bringing Houjou-san back.

Japanese Text:
ほら、こうしている間も
時間は刻々と過ぎていますよ？
Translation: Look, time is ticking with each moment you sit here, you know?

Japanese Text:
あぁ、貸しを作ったのだから生徒会に入れ、
などと言うつもりはありませんよ。
正々堂々、真正面から口説くつもりです。
Translation: Ah, I have no intention to demand that you join the student council to return the favor or anything. I'll neatly and confidently persuade you upfront at a later time.

Japanese Text:
もちろん、あなたが外に出たことも
こちらで誤魔化しておきますので、ご安心を。
Translation: Of course, I'll be playing my part in keeping quiet about you going outside. Rest assured.

Japanese Text:
ほんの少し迷ってから、
私は差し出されたチケットに手を伸ばす。
Translation: After hesitating a bit, I reach my hand out towards the ticket she offered me.

Japanese Text:
悪魔の契約……だとしても、構うもんか。
沙都子のためだったら、私は鬼や悪魔とでも
平常心でチークダンスを踊ってやる……！
Translation:
This could be a deal with a devil... but see if I care.
If it's for Satoko's sake, I'll follow along with a demon or a fiend's slow dance wholeheartedly...!

Japanese Text: ……ありがとうございます。
Translation: ...Thank you very much.

Japanese Text: 健闘を祈ります。
Translation: I pray for a swift and easy journey.

Japanese Text:
笑顔の下で、何を考えているのか
全くわからない生徒会長を……改めて見返す。
Translation: I double took at the president... whose thoughts I was completely unable to interpret underneath that smile.

Japanese Text:
が、彼女の言う通り時間が惜しいことを
思い出した私は、軽く頭を下げてから
寮の中へと駆けこんで自室を目指した。
Translation: But I remembered how she told me that my time was precious, so I bent my head down lightly to rush back, aiming for my room in the dormitory.

Japanese Text:
（早く、沙都子を見つけて……連れ戻す！
今考えることは、それだけだ……！）
Translation: (I have to find Satoko as fast as I can... and bring her back with me! That's all I can think of right now...!)
